tasks.task: Expressing gratitude repeatedly. Then subtasks: physical gestures that accompany the word, like lifting hands, tilting head, smiling. So if the transcript was more complex, involving other actions, more tasks would come into play, but given the simplicity, it's just expressing gratitude with body language.
